---
title: 'ggfortify: Unified Interface to Visualize Statistical Results of Popular R
  Packages'
abstract: The ggfortify package provides a unified interface that enables users to
  use one line of code to visualize statistical results of many R packages using ggplot2
  idioms. With the help of ggfortify, statisticians, data scientists, and researchers
  can avoid the sometimes repetitive work of using the ggplot2 syntax to achieve what
  they need.
